org.openstreetmap.osm.data
Class WayHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.osm.data.WayHelper

public class WayHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class stores all the functionality that we want for ways but that is not included in the osmosis-way-class. The classes org.openstreetmap.osm.data.Node/Segment/Way will disapear with the upcoming OSM-0.5 -API. (That will also no longer have segments at all.)

Author:
Marcus Wolschon

simplifyWay

public java.util.List<org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.WayNode> simplifyWay(org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Way w)
Simplify the given way. Do not touch nodes that are part of more then one way.

Parameters:
w - the way to look at. It is not modified
Returns:
the new list of way-nodes for the simplified way.

simplifyWay

public java.util.List<org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.WayNode> simplifyWay(org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Way w,
                                                                                      double threshold,
                                                                                      double maxNodeDistance,
                                                                                      boolean keepTaggedNodes,
                                                                                      boolean keepIntersectionNodes)
Simplify the given way. Do not touch nodes that are part of more then one way.

Parameters:
w - the way to look at. It is not modified
threshold - the threshold for xtemax in meters.
maxNodeDistance - maximum distance between 2 nodes
keepTaggedNodes - if true, nodes with tags are not removed
keepIntersectionNodes - keep nodes belonging to more then one way
Returns:
the new list of way-nodes for the simplified way.

simplifyWay

public java.util.List<org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.WayNode> simplifyWay(java.util.List<org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.WayNode> wnew,
                                                                                      double threshold,
                                                                                      double minNodeDistance,
                                                                                      boolean keepTaggedNodes,
                                                                                      boolean keepIntersectionNodes)
Simplify the given way. Do not touch nodes that are part of more then one way.

Parameters:
wnew - the way to look at. It is not modified
threshold - the threshold for xtemax in meters in meters.
minNodeDistance - maximum distance between 2 nodes
keepTaggedNodes - if true, nodes with tags are not removed
keepIntersectionNodes - keep nodes belonging to more then one way
Returns:
the new list of way-nodes for the simplified way.

simplifyWayRange

public void simplifyWayRange(java.util.List<org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.WayNode> aWay,
                             int from,
                             int to,
                             double thr,
                             double minDist)
Simplify the part of the given way between from and to. We assume that any node except to and from can be removed without breaking anything.

Parameters:
thr - the threshold for xtemax in meters.
aWay - the way who's WayNodes to look at.
from - the first way-node to look at.
to - the last way-node to look at.
minDist - minimum distance between 2 nodes

Parameters:
street - a way
aMap - a map to get the nodes
Returns:
bounds that contain all points of that way.

Function to calculate the area of polygon bounding box.

Parameters:
way - the way of polygon
Returns:
area of the polygon bounding box in square meters.

area

public static double area(Coordinate[] polyPoints)
Function to calculate the area of a polygon, according to the algorithm defined at http://local.wasp.uwa.edu.au/~pbourke/geometry/polyarea/ Please use an area-true projection for serious use.

Parameters:
polyPoints - array of points in the polygon
Returns:
area of the polygon defined by pgPoints

centerOfMass

public static double[] centerOfMass(Coordinate[] polyPoints)
Function to calculate the center of mass for a given polygon, according ot the algorithm defined at http://local.wasp.uwa.edu.au/~pbourke/geometry/polyarea/ .

Parameters:
polyPoints - array of points in the polygon
Returns:
point that is the center of mass (x, y)

containsNode

public static boolean containsNode(org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Way aToWay,
                                   long aNodeID)
Parameters:
aToWay - the way to check.
aNodeID - the ID to look for
Returns:
true if the way contains the node with this ID.

isParallel

public static java.util.List<org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Node> isParallel(java.util.List<org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Node> aFirstWay,
                                                                                         java.util.List<org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Node> aSecondWay)
Determine if all of aFirstWay is parallel to a part of aSecondWay or the other way around. To optimize, aFirstWay should be the longer one.

Parameters:
aFirstWay - way 1 - warning: this this is being modified
aSecondWay - way 2 - warning: this this is being modified
Returns:
null if not or a list of the smaller way merged into the longer way

getDistanceAndInsert

public static double getDistanceAndInsert(org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Node aNode,
                                          java.util.List<org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Node> aWay)
Side-effect: aNode is inserted into aFirstWay in the place of least distance to the way.

Parameters:
aNode - a node to determine the distance of
aWay - a way to determine the distance to and insert the node into
Returns:
the shortest distance between a point and a polyline in meters.

getDistance

public static double getDistance(org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Node aNode,
                                 org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Node aStart,
                                 org.openstreetmap.osmosis.core.domain.v0_6.Node aEnd)
Parameters:
aNode - the node to test
aStart - start of the line
aEnd - end of the line
Returns:
the shortest distance between a point and a line in meters.
